content: You are here because you are loved. By your husband. You are here because you love. Don’t worry about your thoughts. They are sent to you from your wounded subconscious. Observe them, don’t act on them. You are not just a good bipolar. You are good, period. You have bipolar disorder. You are not your illness. You have an illness. You are so much more. Keep on writing. Write about love. Love.
